en2: I supported the new recycling initiative at my workplace.
I consider myself a multi-skilled employee who can handle both technical and creative tasks.
I value the flexibility of working from home.
I used benchmarking to evaluate our team's performance against industry leaders.
I need to collate all the survey results before writing the report.
I helped roll out the new training program across all departments.
I only have anecdotal evidence to support my claim.
I had to work part-time to pay my college tuition.
I'm hoping for a high return on investment from this project.
I admire countries that promote social mobility through education.
vn1: (n) sự di chuyển / khả năng chuyển đổi

en2: I always enjoy talking to him because he's so cultured and well-read.
vn1: (a) có học thức, có văn hóa

en2: I found it hard to work under such an authoritarian manager.
I was shocked by the high mortality rate during the pandemic.
I never imagined living through a global pandemic in my lifetime.
I'm optimistic that things will get better soon.
I feel a heavy burden trying to support my whole family.
I noticed a strong correlation between exercise and better sleep.
I try to reduce my reliance on technology in daily life.
I was glued to the screen during the entire movie.
I don't like the restriction on visiting hours at the hospital.
I noticed a marked improvement in my English after daily practice.
I enjoy a wide variety of music genres, from classical to rock.
I felt uncoordinated when I tried to dance for the first time.
I tried to disguise my nervousness during the interview.
I covertly glanced at my friend's test to check one answer.
vn1: (adv) một cách bí mật, lén lút

en2: I had to adjust my schedule to make time for exercise.
I always refer to my notes before an important meeting.
I felt some discomfort after sitting in the same position for hours.
